Name: PING 1.5+™
About the game: Everyone on the block is playing this game! PING 1.5+™ is a new arcade style puzzle game with the objective of shooting the cube through over 100 stages to reach the orange. Get frustrated in trying to beat all of the stages; this game isn't for the weakhearted. PING 1.5+™ mimics the retro days of gaming by having a notoriously hard difficulty curve. PING™ is on a mission to save the world against the Spheres. Will he succeed? Only you can decide the world's fate with your 'ultimate master super gaming' skills. Game Features Over 100 levels Original soundtrack by Elkskin Retro 3D visuals HARD
